article.class: post-6343 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail sticky hentry category-community

h2.a: UPDATES: Grab and Go Meals on Tuesdays and Hector’s Cupboard

div.p: Please review the following changes to Grab and Go meals and Hector’s Cupboard curbside pickup: Hector’s Cupboard items are available for curbside pickup ONLY at the school on Wednesdays, 3:45-4:45. Please contact Tara Northrop if you have any questions about these Hector’s Cupboard deliveries. 515-827-5418 / tara_northrop@s-hamilton.k12.ia.us SH Flyer Updated 040920 LINK TO MEAL SIGN UP SURVEY

article.class: post-6217 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail sticky hentry category-academics

div.p: South Hamilton Students, Parents, and Community: We have put together a Google Drive system of folders for grades PS-12, accessible to any student/parent/family member who would like downloadable and printable materials, links to teacher websites and classrooms, and more. Anyone with this link has access 24/7, and you do not need to login to view. Teachers are still updating material

div.p: The South Hamilton Community School District staff, students, and stakeholders understand that selecting a school district for your child to attend is impacted by many factors.

div.p: Please note the April 22nd, 2020, Special Board Meeting has been cancelled.

article.class: post-6433 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-elementary-news

div.p: Pick up Day / Student Items Elementary Parents, We have scheduled Wednesday, April 29th for you to pick up any student items left in the classroom. Your child’s teacher will have items bagged up and ready to be picked up from 12:00 – 6:00 pm on the 29th. Please pull in the drive on the south parking lot by the

article.class: post-6416 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-athletics category-community

div.p: If you ordered track apparel online, the money will be refunded by Decker’s and should be completed by Wednesday 4/22/20. If you submitted a paper order with a check, those orders will be shredded. If you want your check back instead of shredding please contact Jackie Swanson at 515-291-7789 by 4/22/20.

article.class: post-6409 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-community

div.p: As per today’s decree from Governor Kim Reynolds all schools in Iowa will be closed for the remainder of the academic year. South Hamilton, like every other school district in the state, will continue to provide virtual educational opportunities from now through May 30th, 2020. The district’s staff has provided our students with high-quality learning experiences and will be doing

article.class: post-6406 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-community category-uncategorized

div.p: We all realize that this is an extremely turbulent time in our collective history; a trying period we did not see coming — and one that we do not care to experience again. COVID-19 has forced us to change almost everything we do in some manner or another … including how we “do school.” Our teaching and learning are now
